item.title: Design Tic Tac Toe
item.description: Design a Tic-tac-toe game that is played between two players on a n x n grid. You may assume the following rules: A move is guaranteed to be valid and is placed on an empty block. Once a winning condition is reached, no more moves is allowed. A player who succeeds in placing n of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game. Example: Given n = 3, assume that player 1 is "X" and player 2 is "O" in the board.
